summary: A self-taught front-end developer, my passion is to provide well tested and maintainable code, pixel-perfect user interfaces and the best user experience using the latest technologies.
about:
I'm currently working as a Front-End Developer at OPTISANTIS, based in Grenoble, France. With over 6 years of professional experience, I specialize in turning ideas into reality through modern JS technologies such as Next.js, React.js, Node.js, Redux, and Angular 2+. 
 I'm passionate about building clean, scalable, and maintainable applications. I place a strong focus on code readability and best practices, using tools like ESLint, Prettier, and StyleLint to ensure quality and consistency. 
 Beyond writing code, I thrive on continuous improvement, striving every day to become a better developer than I was yesterday. 
 Scroll down to explore some of the projects I've been working on.
